DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize study evaluate new generation MicroPort 's DES safety , efficacy delivery system treat CAD . The end point observe in-stent late lumen loss 9 month stent implantation . The second end point study in-stent percent diameter stenosis . This study base non-inferior assumption ( vs. Xience V DES ) , require end point reach statistical significance . Prespecified OCT follow-up plan 3-Year index PCI 3 chosen hospital .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized MicroPort 's Firehawk DES Versus Xience V
DOC.criteria: Age 1875 , male woman pregnant Evidence nonsymptomatic ischemia , stable nonstable angina past heart attack case Target lesion primary , single artery single lesion coronary artery Target lesion vessel length ≤24mm , diameter 2.25mm－4.0mm Lesion diameter stenosis ≥70 % Candidates understand study , willing sign Consent Agreement willing accept followup For long lesion group , least one target lesion length ≥28mm，diameter 2.5mm－4.0mm , one lesion need implant 33mm 0r 38mm long stent Acute heart attack within one week Chronic complete stenosis ( TIMI 0 ) , leave main lesion , three branch need treat , branch vessel diameter ≤2.5mm bypass lesion Calcified lesion fail predilation twist lesion Instent restenosis Stent implant within one year Severe heart failure ( NYHA III ) leave ventricle EF < 40 % Renal function damage , blood creatinine > 2.0mg/dl Bleeding risk ; allergic drug agent use procedure/treatment Life expectation < 12 month No compliance protocol Heart implantation case Prespecified OCT inclusion/exclusion criterion : Patients underwent 9month angio F/U No binary restenosis 9month LLL 0.01~0.2mm No miximplanted stent No one bailout stent No TLR occur 3 year PCI The target vessel able deliver OCT catheter
